section1.positions: Software Developer, iOS Developer, Web Designer, Graphic Designer
section1.bio: Hi! My name is Sergio Nunez. I am a Software Developer, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work. With 20 years experience as a professional graphic designer/web developer, I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project a success. I enjoy every step of the design process, from discussion and collaboration to concept and execution, but I find the most satisfaction in seeing the finished product do everything for you that it was created to do.

section2.description: I am an iOS developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a range of iOS devices including mobile phones and tablet computers. Mainly I work in the development of iOS applications as a front-end developer, and I do some of their integration with back-end services. I have experience working alongside other engineers and developers where we work on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, I have developed a good sense of commitment to collaborative problem solving. I enjoy sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products.
section2.skills: iOS:80, Swift:90, Objective-C:70, Wordpress:80, Javascript:80, React:70, Adobe Suite:95, C++:80
